level.heading: Continuing education.
level.text: The Mayor shall establish by rule continuing-education requirements as a condition for renewal of the license to practice pharmaceutical detailing.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 3-1205.10.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 17-131
level.text: For Law 17-131, see notes following ยง 3-1207.41.
